meanings.sent1: She toted her backpack to school every day.
meanings.sent2: The delivery person toted the heavy package to the doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The little boy toted his teddy bear around the house, pretending it was his bodyguard.
meanings.sent4: The ant toted the food crumb back to its nest, showing impressive strength.
meanings.sent5: The farmer toted the bales of hay with ease, showcasing his strong muscles.

meanings.sent1: He toted a big smile on his face after receiving good news.
meanings.sent2: The old tree toted many colorful leaves in the autumn season.
meanings.sent3: The cat toted a mischievous look in its eyes as it plotted its next adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her words toted a sense of wisdom beyond her years.
meanings.sent5: The painting toted a sense of melancholy that touched the viewers' hearts.

meanings.sent1: The truck toted a load of furniture across the country.
meanings.sent2: The boat toted passengers to the beautiful island for a vacation.
meanings.sent3: The drone toted a small camera to capture aerial views of the landscape.
meanings.sent4: The train toted goods from one city to another efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The bicycle toted the rider up the steep hill with determination.
